Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__47.1__Waters: These waters are not to be understood literally (for there were none such that flowed from the temple); but mystically, of the baptism of Christ, and of his doctrine and his gracethe trees that grow on the banks are Christian virtuesthe fishes are Christians, that spiritually live in and by these holy waters, the fishermen are the apostles, and apostolic preachersthe fenny places, where there is no health, are such as by being out of the church are separated from these waters of life.
